{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3330232,"name":"fovea1959","username":"fovea1959","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fovea1959/{size}/5301_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-11T18:35:31.885Z","cooked":"

Is something in GradleRIO that we can use to clear the deploy directory on the roboRIO? Either an existing task, or a way to shoot off a command to the RIO via SSH?

It‚Äôs related to Pathplanner AutoChooser remembers deleted autos

We could write a Windows script to do it, but just making sure that there is not already wonderfulness in GradleRIO‚Ä¶

We always just SSH in and delete the directory and redeploy code.

No, there is nothing built-in. Maybe next year.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2024-03-11T19:44:05.517Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":9,"reads":218,"readers_count":217,"score":93.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":458273,"topic_slug":"clearing-the-deploy-directory-on-a-roborio-running-commands-on-the-roborio","display_username":"Peter Johnson","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":13575,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Volunteer WPILib Developer, CSA"},"post_url":"/t/clearing-the-deploy-directory-on-a-roborio-running-commands-on-the-roborio/458273/3","custom_user_title":"Volunteer WPILib Developer, CSA","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3330365,"name":"fovea1959","username":"fovea1959","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fovea1959/{size}/5301_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-11T20:00:43.520Z","cooked":"
Emerson1706:

We always just SSH in and delete the directory and redeploy code.

Trying to make it bullet- and forgetful-person- proof.

Peter_Johnson:

No, there is nothing built-in. Maybe next year.

That would be nice, especially having the bits where GradleRIO figures out where the roboRIO is addressed accessible.

https://gradle-ssh-plugin.github.io/docs/ will get us going for this year.

Completely untested, but it might work to add the following to the deploy {} block in build.gradle above the frcStaticFileDeploy line:

frcClearStaticDeploy(getArtifactTypeClass('CommandArtifact')) {
  command = 'rm -rf /home/lvuser/deploy'
}

But I don‚Äôt know if these are ordered, so this might delete after it copies? @Thad_House can confirm.

They are not ordered, and would race with each other. A precommand in the existing file deploy block should work, but I‚Äôd have to go look up the right way to run that.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2024-03-11T20:36:06.887Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":4,"reads":177,"readers_count":176,"score":60.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":458273,"topic_slug":"clearing-the-deploy-directory-on-a-roborio-running-commands-on-the-roborio","display_username":"Dan Katzuv","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":32004,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5987 Software Mentor üáÆüá±"},"post_url":"/t/clearing-the-deploy-directory-on-a-roborio-running-commands-on-the-roborio/458273/7","custom_user_title":"5987 Software Mentor üáÆüá±","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3330424,"name":"Peter Johnson","username":"Peter_Johnson","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/peter_johnson/{size}/10417_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-11T20:42:21.138Z","cooked":"

Or even use Windows Explorer and connect with FTP.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2024-03-11T20:42:21.138Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":7,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":171,"readers_count":170,"score":64.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":458273,"topic_slug":"clearing-the-deploy-directory-on-a-roborio-running-commands-on-the-roborio","display_username":"Peter Johnson","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":32004,"username":"dan","name":"Dan Katzuv","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/eada6e/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":13575,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Volunteer WPILib Developer, CSA"},"post_url":"/t/clearing-the-deploy-directory-on-a-roborio-running-commands-on-the-roborio/458273/8","custom_user_title":"Volunteer WPILib Developer, CSA","reactions":[{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":1},{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3330730,"name":"fovea1959","username":"fovea1959","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fovea1959/{size}/5301_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-12T02:04:35.729Z","cooked":"
Thad_House:

They are not ordered, and would race with each other. A precommand in the existing file deploy block should work, but I‚Äôd have to go look up the right way to run that.

Would this be correct (with the correct content in the clearDeploy task?

task clearDeploy {
    print "clearing deploy"
}

tasks.deploy.dependsOn clearDeploy
","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2024-03-12T02:04:35.729Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":16,"reads":172,"readers_count":171,"score":119.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":458273,"topic_slug":"clearing-the-deploy-directory-on-a-roborio-running-commands-on-the-roborio","display_username":"fovea1959","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":15648,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Herder of 3620 Programmers / LRI / CSA"},"post_url":"/t/clearing-the-deploy-directory-on-a-roborio-running-commands-on-the-roborio/458273/9","custom_user_title":"Herder of 3620 Programmers / LRI / CSA","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3332704,"name":"Thad House","username":"Thad_House","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/a4c791/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-14T03:55:41.775Z","cooked":"

No. That creates a new task on the entire deploy sequence, which wouldn‚Äôt work.

You need to add a predeploy specifically to the static file deploy task.


 frcStaticFileDeploy(getArtifactTypeClass('FileTreeArtifact')) {
    predeploy << { execute 'rm -rf /home/lvuser/deploy' } // << Add this line
    files = project.fileTree('src/main/deploy')
    directory = '/home/lvuser/deploy'
}
","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2024-03-14T03:56:15.654Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":9,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":61,"reads":150,"readers_count":149,"score":370.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":458273,"topic_slug":"clearing-the-deploy-directory-on-a-roborio-running-commands-on-the-roborio","display_username":"Thad House","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/where-are-preferences-stored-on-rio/460735/5","internal":true,"reflection":true,"title":"Where are Preferences stored on Rio","clicks":4}],"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":15648,"username":"fovea1959","name":"fovea1959","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fovea1959/{size}/5301_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":16147,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"WPILib Dev | 2025 VOTY"},"post_url":"/t/clearing-the-deploy-directory-on-a-roborio-running-commands-on-the-roborio/458273/10","custom_user_title":"WPILib Dev | 2025 VOTY","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":true,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3332790,"name":"fovea1959","username":"fovea1959","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fovea1959/{size}/5301_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-14T10:17:13.140Z","cooked":"

Thank you!

Out of curiosity, what would the failure mode for the separate task be? Your solution is better (I don‚Äôt have to add anything to fire off commands over ssh, things happen at a ‚Äúbetter‚Äù time), but I‚Äôm trying to understand what I missed.

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2024-03-14T10:17:13.140Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":10,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":142,"readers_count":141,"score":38.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":458273,"topic_slug":"clearing-the-deploy-directory-on-a-roborio-running-commands-on-the-roborio","display_username":"fovea1959","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":16147,"username":"Thad_House","name":"Thad House","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/a4c791/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":15648,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Herder of 3620 Programmers / LRI / CSA"},"post_url":"/t/clearing-the-deploy-directory-on-a-roborio-running-commands-on-the-roborio/458273/11","custom_user_title":"Herder of 3620 Programmers / LRI / CSA","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3332938,"name":"Thad House","username":"Thad_House","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/a4c791/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-14T14:56:49.962Z","cooked":"

All deploy actions are individual tasks. The high level deploy task is just a task that depends on all the individual tasks. So by adding a new task that just deploy depends on, that task can run basically any time before the global deploy task. So it could run before, after, or even during in parallel with the file deploy task. You just don‚Äôt know, because all you told gradle was the global deploy task depended on that task running at some point.

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2024-03-14T14:56:49.962Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":11,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":119,"readers_count":118,"score":33.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":458273,"topic_slug":"clearing-the-deploy-directory-on-a-roborio-running-commands-on-the-roborio","display_username":"Thad House","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":15648,"username":"fovea1959","name":"fovea1959","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fovea1959/{size}/5301_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":16147,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"WPILib Dev | 2025 VOTY"},"post_url":"/t/clearing-the-deploy-directory-on-a-roborio-running-commands-on-the-roborio/458273/12","custom_user_title":"WPILib Dev | 2025 VOTY","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3333005,"name":"fovea1959","username":"fovea1959","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fovea1959/{size}/5301_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-14T15:59:49.197Z","cooked":"

ah! so if I had the static file deploy task (is it >named< frcStaticFileDeploy?) depend on my clearDeploy task, that would have been correct?

I‚Äôm still using your solution, it takes care of all the ssh goodness, just trying to learn a little more about gradle.
